about_the_game:
Zodiac Mountain

Game Description

Embark on an exhilarating adventure in the mystical landscapes of ancient China with Zodiac Mountain. Join a determined panda on a journey to prove its worth to the revered Chinese Zodiacs in this roguelike deck-building game. Zodiac Mountain seamlessly blends strategic gameplay with captivating storytelling, inspired by rich Asian cultural narratives.

Key Features

  • Dual Decks System: Utilize two card decks to create powerful synergies, unlocking new abilities and strategies.
  • Balance and Manipulate: Add strategic depth by managing a scale that influences gameplay.
  • Dynamic Turn Queue: Plan your moves in advance to outsmart enemies with a flexible turn-based system.
  • Rich Cultural Themes: Immerse yourself in the aesthetics and folklore of ancient China.
  • Procedurally Generated Mountains: Experience unique playthroughs with ever-changing environments.
  • Turn-Based Combat: Engage in strategic battles against diverse Chinese-themed enemies and mythical creatures.

Gameplay Mechanics

  • Card System: Master the art of managing dual decks, combining cards for synergistic effects that enhance your abilities and strategies.
  • Turn-Based Combat: Strategically plan your moves using the turn queue, balancing offense and defense to defeat a variety of foes.
  • Progression: Navigate procedurally generated mountains, facing new challenges and uncovering hidden secrets with each playthrough.

Visual and Audio Elements

  • Art Style: Enjoy stunning visuals inspired by traditional Chinese ink paintings and watercolor art.
  • Key Visuals: Intricately designed characters and breathtaking landscapes that reflect the game’s rich cultural themes.
  • Audio: Experience modernized Chinese music influenced by traditional instrumentals and scores, enhancing the immersive atmosphere.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: "Zodiac Mountain" is a roguelike deckbuilder following the journey of a Panda as they adventure to become a Chinese Zodiac. Utilise dual decks of Yin & Yang, encounter mythical characters, outskill your enemies, and climb Zodiac Mountain.

English*, Simplified Chinese*
